summary: This mod aims to solve the problem of becoming overpowered through smithing. It adds new versions of all the vanilla armors and weapons to the leveled lists with equivalent stats and price to upgraded gear of each level (i.e. fine, superior, etc.) The best part is that they\'re not upgradable or directly craftable to prevent upgrading items to be e
descriptionHtml: [img width=\"100\" height=\"50\" alt=\"Lubek city gate\" title=\"Crafting Equivalent Loot Lists\"]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21041-1-1343151031.jpg[/img]
author: Rifli
